tourBios.curYrHigh: Earned PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status in January with a T7 at Florida's Q-School in Sebring.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Joined the Mackenzie Tour- PGA TOUR Canada with a T2 at the Florida Q-School in April… Only cut made in seven starts in Canada was T23 at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open in June... Teamed up with his countryman Rafa Campos to finish in second place at the Bridgestone America's Golf Cup in Mexico City. 

2014: Finished T130 at Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the Puerto Rico Men's Amateur Championship and the Caribbean Amateur Championship. Earned 2012-2013 Atlantic Sun Conference Freshman of the Year honors. Was also a two-time Division II tournament winner…Broke the Florida Gulf Coast 54-hole scoring record in a tournament (16-under-par)…Competed in the 2012 and 2013 Puerto Rico Open on the PGA TOUR… Finished T14 at the 2012 Puerto Rico Classic on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica.
tourBios.personal: Favorite golf memory is competing on the PGA TOUR's 2012 Puerto Rico Open while still in High School… Attended St. John Neumann HS in Naples, FL… His favorite city is Vancouver, Canada. His bucket list includes having a residence there… Would be a medical doctor, if he weren't playing professional golf… Favorite books include the Maze Runner series… Favorite athletes outside of golf are Michael Jordan and Bruce Lee… Dream foursome includes his grandfather, sister and Bruce Lee.
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - Finished 2-11 at 2016 Q-School (exempt to midseason reshuffle)
Conditional - Finished T114 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.curYearHigh: Earned PGA TOUR Latinoamérica status in January with a T7 at Florida's Q-School in Sebring.
tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Played in seven events on the Mackenzie Tour- PGA TOUR Canada and recorded one top-25 performance. 2014: Finished T130 at Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament in December.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the Puerto Rico Men's Amateur Championship and the Caribbean Amateur Championship. Earned 2012-2013 Atlantic Sun Conference Freshman of the Year honors. Was also a two-time Division II tournament winner...Broke the Florida Gulf Coast 54-hole scoring record in a tournament (16-under-par)...Competed in the 2012 and 2013 Puerto Rico Open on the PGA TOUR.
tourBios.personal: Met World Golf Hall of Famer Chi Chi Rodriguez at the PGA TOUR's Puerto Rico Open...Favorite vacation spot is the Caribbean Islands. Would be a medical doctor, if he weren't playing professional golf... Favorite books include the Maze Runner series...Dream foursome includes his grandfather, sister and Tiger Woods.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was T23rd in 2015 at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open presented by Times Colonist.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T60th in Total Eagles on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
